name: Head grower
description: Can view and edit everything of the cultivation and manage the team.

name: Grower
description: Can view and edit everything of the cultivation.

name: Observer
description: Can view the crop plan, KPI’s, scenario’s, yield predictions and harvested kilo’s of the cultivation.

name: Guest
description: Can view the KPI’s of the cultivation.

name: Wholesaler
description: Can view the yield predictions and harvested kilo’s of the cultivation.
